content: So, I’d say if you look at this over an extended period of time, depending on how long this dislocation lasts, one major point I want to get across rich is, we think will be a viable trading environment, even in down markets, once price discovery equilibrium has been met. Hey, Ken this is Mark. Hey, Ken this is Mark. It’s inappropriate for us to provide greater details and guidance, but let me kind of go back to what we said and, the things that, that we all know that if you think about kind of the market and the way it’s progressed in the last couple of quarters, now that hit a all time high back in November, it declined through the middle of February.
